001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config;
002
003import org.aeonbits.owner.ConfigCache;
004
005/**
006 * Singleton holder for accessing the framework configuration.
007 *
008 * <p>This class ensures a single instance of {@code FrameworkConfig} is created
009 * and provides a global access point for retrieving configuration values.
010 *
011 * <p>The configuration is lazily initialized upon first access and cached for
012 * subsequent use, optimizing performance by avoiding redundant object creation.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
015 */
016public class FrameworkConfigHolder {
017
018   /**
019    * Cached instance of the framework configuration.
020    */
021   private static FrameworkConfig config;
022
023   private FrameworkConfigHolder() {
024   }
025
026   /**
027    * Retrieves the singleton instance of {@code FrameworkConfig}.
028    *
029    * <p>If the configuration is not yet initialized, it is created and cached
030    * using {@code ConfigCache}.
031    *
032    * @return The {@code FrameworkConfig} instance.
033    */
034   public static FrameworkConfig getFrameworkConfig() {
035      if (config == null) {
036         config = ConfigCache.getOrCreate(FrameworkConfig.class);
037      }
038      return config;
039   }
040
041}
